Key Match Events: Cleveland staged a 14-point comeback in the third quarter
Evan Mobley had a standout defensive performance with 13 rebounds and 4 steals
Collin Sexton scored 23 points and Lauri Markkanen added 20
Cleveland improved to 11-0 with the win
Post-Match Reflections: Cavs coach Kenny Atkinson praised the team's resilience
Atkinson emphasized preserving the team's unbeaten start
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was significant for Cleveland's perfect start
Brooklyn's Cam Johnson led with 23 points
